casebody.data:
UNITED STATES, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. Samuel J. KEARING, Defendant-Appellant. No. 156. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Oct. 6, 1931. James J. Crowley, of Syracuse, N. Y., for appellant. Oliver D. Burden, U. S. Atty., and Roger O. Baldwin, Asst. U. S. Atty., both of Syracuse, N. Y.

Before MANTON, L. HAND, and SWAN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed in open court.
